metadata.title: CVE-2024-7348 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Time-of-check Time-of-use (TOCTOU) race condition in pg_dump in PostgreSQLallows an object creator to execute arbitrary SQL functions as the userrunning pg_dump, which is often a superuser. The attack involves replacinganother relation type with a view or foreign table. The attack requireswaiting for pg_dump to start, but winning the race condition is trivial ifthe attacker retains an open transaction. Versions before PostgreSQL 16.4,15.8, 14.13, 13.16, and 12.20 are affected.

criterions.comment: postgresql-12 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
